name: Ext_R3_MedicationStatement_partOf
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.MedicationStatement.partOf for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents MedicationStatement.partOf from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicationStatement|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R5.

element.definition: A larger event of which this particular event is a component or step.
element.comment: `MedicationStatement.partOf` maps to R5 `MedicationStatement.partOf`. Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicationAdministration)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicationDispense)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Observation)` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
